Pati Yang's debut album is proof that if members of The Beatles and The Rolling Stones were born in Poland, the world on these teams would have a chance not to hear.

Young artist has recorded a very fresh and original album, which was well received by critics and listeners, except that the latter group was not too large. And not because Poles were not ready for music, which proposed Pati. I think this wine to a record company. With the rest after years of Pati Yang in an interview with TV4 said:

"The lizard was actually very pleasantly received by audiences, critics and was fantastic at that time, while I admit that the label was not the same opinion, then-label with which I was bound and brought me an awful lot of trouble in this regard. They had a completely different vision for it is who am I to be, and I had my own vision for who they wanted to be. And unfortunately, our visions they were completely divergent. "- She says.

"Lizard" is 11 pieces in style trip hop tracks holding high the global level. She herself admitted that her inspiration is Massie Attack and Tricky. A bit of a listen, but actually is more about atmosphere than a specific solution. Another thing, for example, that if such a "lizard" in the English version of the album was one of the Western artists probably would have to deal with the global hit. And it is one of those permanent part of the canon of the genre. With the rest the same can be said of other works, even "Underlegend" or "Aooh.

The album "Lizard" is not polite, organized as songs. There is however a lot of emotions, broken sounds, both in terms of anxiety in music and text. Compositions are great climate and perfect voice Pati Yang, who had already (as a teenager) was a professional singer. In fact, the whole atmosphere is maintained in a trip-hop, but there is no shortage of surprising moments. Like for example in the "can forget" the song which musically is part of a convention of jazz (although there is no shortage of electronics).

After the release of their debut album, Pati Yang went to London. Initially, there had to spend 3-4 weeks. Was. And though Polish music long remained a poorer Pati is an exceptional talent for her and her career direction as the British proved to be the most correct. I listen to it on the next album.
